scripts.generate:
nmp install
 npm install pug-cli -g
pug --client --no-debug -n index  public/templates/index.pug
pug --client --no-debug -n signIn  public/templates/signIn.pug
pug --client --no-debug -n clientReg  public/templates/clientReg.pug
pug --client --no-debug -n workerReg  public/templates/workerReg.pug
pug --client --no-debug -n profile  public/templates/profile.pug
pug --client --no-debug -n navbar  public/templates/navbar.pug
